verses.verse: This <S%G5124><s%> is the third <S%G5154>time<s%> I am <S%G2064>coming<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G5209>you.<s%> <S%G1909>In<s%> the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> of <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2532>or<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G3144>witnesses<s%> shall <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G4487>word<s%> be <S%G2476>established.<s%>

I told you <S%G4280>before,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4302>foretell<s%> you, as <S%G5613>if<s%> I were <S%G3918>present,<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> second <S%G1208>time;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> being <S%G548>absent<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> I <S%G1125>write<s%> to them which heretofore have <S%G4258>sinned,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3062>other,<s%> <S%G3754>that,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> I <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G3825>again,<s%> I will <S%G3756>not<s%> spare: <S%G5339><s%>

Since <S%G1893><s%> ye <S%G2212>seek<s%> a <S%G1382>proof<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2980>speaking<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1698>me,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G5209>you-ward<s%> is not <S%G770>weak,<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G235>but<s%> is <S%G1414>mighty<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5213>you.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G2532>though<s%> <S%G1487><s%> he was <S%G4717>crucified<s%> <S%G1537>through<s%> <S%G769>weakness,<s%> <S%G235>yet<s%> he <S%G2198>liveth<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> the <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%> <S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> are <S%G770>weak<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> we shall <S%G2198>live<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> the <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> <S%G5209>you.<s%>

Examine <S%G3985><s%> <S%G1438>yourselves,<s%> <S%G1487>whether<s%> ye <S%G2075>be<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4102>faith;<s%> <S%G1381>prove<s%> your own <S%G1438>selves.<s%> <S%G2228><s%> <S%G1921>Know<s%> ye <S%G3756>not<s%> your own <S%G1438>selves,<s%> <S%G2228><s%> how <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G1509>except<s%> ye <S%G2075>be<s%> <S%G96>reprobates?<s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G2172>pray<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> that <S%G5209>ye<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G2556>evil;<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> should <S%G5316>appear<s%> <S%G1384>approved,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> should <S%G4160>do<s%> that which is <S%G2570>honest,<s%> <S%G1161>though<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G5600>be<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G96>reprobates.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> we are <S%G5463>glad,<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> are <S%G770>weak,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G5600>are<s%> <S%G1415>strong:<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> we <S%G2172>wish,<s%> even <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2676>perfection.<s%>

Therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> I <S%G1125>write<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> being <S%G548>absent,<s%> <S%G3363>lest<s%> being <S%G3918>present<s%> I should <S%G5530>use<s%> <S%G664>sharpness,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> hath <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3619>edification,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2506>destruction.<s%>

Finally, <S%G3063><s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> <S%G5463>farewell.<s%> Be <S%G2675>perfect,<s%> be of good <S%G3870>comfort,<s%> be of one <S%G5426>mind,<s%> <S%G846><s%> live in <S%G1514>peace;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%> shall <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5216>you.<s%>
